mapper.update: UPDATE zstudent_login SET zstatus=#{zstatus} WHERE ztype='机床' AND zstatus='正常' AND zrecognizeIP IN (SELECT zstudentPCIP FROM ztraining_facility WHERE ztrainingroomID=#{ztrainingroomID});

update zstudent_login set ztesttime=ztesttime+1 where zrecognizetime=( select max(a.zrecognizetime) from ( select * from zstudent_login where zstudentID=#{zstudentID} and zscheduleID=#{zscheduleID} )a)

update zstudent_login set znowtaskname=#{znowtaskname} where zrecognizetime=( select max(a.zrecognizetime) from ( select * from zstudent_login where zstudentID=#{zstudentID} and zscheduleID=#{zscheduleID} )a)
update zstudent_login set znowtaskname=#{znowtaskname},ztesttime=#{ztesttime} where zrecognizeIP=#{zrecognizeIP} and zcheck=#{zcheck}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM zstudent_login WHERE zstudentID=(SELECT zid FROM zstudent WHERE zidentity LIKE #{zidentity})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zstudent_login (zid,zstudentID,zscheduleID,zrecognizetime,zcheck, ztype, zrecognizeIP,zstatus,originalPictureUrl) VALUES(#{zid}, #{zstudentID}, #{zscheduleID},#{zrecongnizetime},#{zcheck}, #{ztype}, #{zrecognizeIP},#{zstatus},#{originalPictureUrl});
mapper.select: SELECT b.zscheduleID from zstudent a,zstudent_schedule b,zschedule c where a.zid=#{zstudentID} and a.zid =b.zstudentID and b.zscheduleID =c.zid and #{timestamp} BETWEEN c.zstartdate and c.zenddate
